title: Abortion: UK women face protests by emboldened campaigners
description: Campaigners call for more protection for women attending clinics in Northern Ireland.

title: Missing Cryptoqueen: Is Dr Ruja Ignatova the biggest Bitcoin holder?
description: As the FBI adds Ruja Ignatova to its most wanted list, new findings suggest she amassed billions in Bitcoin.

title: Dame Deborah James death prompts more bowel-cancer checks
description: The NHS website has had thousands more visits this week after the campaigner's death.

title: Alex Scott: 'I was lucky - the next generation doesn't have to be'
description: With Euro 2022 just around the corner, ex-England defender Alex Scott looks at the rapid pace of change within the women's game.

title: 'Pavement parking frightens me'
description: Ted, who is blind, hopes people will reconsider parking their vehicles on pavements.

title: Adele: Emotion and simplicity are enough at comeback Hyde Park gig
description: The singer tells the crowd at her first public concert in five years she is "so happy" to be back.

title: Hot weather dries up swamp, uncovers ancient fort
description: A historical group was instrumental in discovering a crannog made from stone near Lough Neagh.

title: Steve Wright's plans after show ends? Lunch and a rest!
description: BBC Radio 2's Steve Wright spoke after revealing he will leave his afternoon show in September.

title: Same-sex couples legally marry in Switzerland
description: Couples tie the knot nine months after the country voted for marriage for all.

title: Texas migrant deaths: 'I still have to bring my children home'
description: A grieving Honduran mother tells of her despair over relatives lost in the Texas lorry tragedy.

title: Ukraine demands the seizure of Russian-flagged grain ship off Turkey
description: Ship tracking reveals the route of a grain shipment from Russian-controlled Ukraine.

title: Wimbledon 2022: Jelena Ostapenko reaches fourth round with three-set win over Irina-Camelia Begu
description: Watch Jelena Ostapenko's marvellous third set display against Irina-Camelia Begu taking it 6-1 to advance into the fourth round of Wimbledon.

title: Zara Aleena: Woman killed on street was loved by everybody, says family
description: The aspiring lawyer, killed in a London street attack, was empathetic and fearless, her aunt says.

title: Chris Pincher: Call to suspend Tory MP after groping allegations
description: The Conservatives are facing pressure to suspend Chris Pincher as an MP and launch a formal investigation.

title: Oleksandr Usyk v Anthony Joshua II: Eddie Hearn defends decision to stage rematch in Saudi Arabia
description: Matchroom promoter Eddie Hearn and British heavyweight Anthony Joshua defend the decision to fight in Saudi Arabia, which has faced accusations of human rights violations.

title: EastEnders: Drag queen Tara Misu revealed as regular character
description: Actor Matthew Morrison says it is "a privilege" to represent the LGBTQ+ community in the BBC soap.

title: Energy companies' customer service hits record low
description: Standards have "plummeted" since last year when many firms went bust, Citizens Advice says.

title: Brittney Griner: Detained US basketball star appears in Russian court on drug charges
description: If convicted on drugs charges Brittney Griner faces up to 10 years in prison.

title: 'I've written a book about my brother's autism'
description: Tabitha Jennings, 11, hopes her work will help other children to learn about the condition.

title: Rail strikes: No rush to call for more action, says union
description: The RMT's comments follow last week's industrial action which caused travel disruption across the UK.

title: Watch: The moment a Landslide descends on town in Peru
description: No deaths or serious injures are reported, but authorities are searching for people who may be missing.

title: England v India: Shubman Gill is caught by Zak Crawley off the bowling of James Anderson
description: James Anderson makes an early breakthrough removing India opening batsman Shubman Gill for 17 on day one of the fifth Test at Edgbaston.

title: Russia moves to take control of Sakhalin-2 oil and gas project
description: The Russian government moves to take over Sakhalin-2 in which Shell has a share of more than a quarter.

title: Logan Paul: Youtuber signs WWE contract ready for Summerslam
description: The YouTuber will return to the ring to reignite his feud with veteran wrestler The Miz.

title: War in Ukraine: Can we say how many people have died?
description: Russia and Ukraine have different claims of how many people have died in the conflict. The BBC explores the data.

title: Hong Kong: Xi Jinping defends China's rule at handover anniversary
description: Despite criticism, China's leader says the "one country two systems" model works and must continue.

title: Technoblade: Minecraft YouTuber dies from cancer aged 23
description: The popular gamer, who had been living with cancer, signed off by saying "so long nerds".

title: Bison attacks woman at Yellowstone National Park
description: It is the second such incident in three days in the US park.

title: Missing Cryptoqueen: FBI adds Ruja Ignatova to top ten most wanted
description: Ruja Ignatova is accused of defrauding victims out of $4bn (£3.2bn) through a cryptocurrency scam.

title: End-of-life: How home nurses helped ease my husband's last days
description: Since the pandemic more people are choosing to die at home, including campaigner Dame Deborah James.

title: The fight to save vanishing wildflower meadows
description: Conservationists urge action to reverse a "catastrophic" decline in the nation's natural habitats.

title: Nato Summit: Did Justin Trudeau forget Australian PM’s name?
description: The awkward moment played out when the leaders met at the Nato Summit in Madrid.

title: North Korea claims Covid arrived on 'alien things' near border
description: It has recorded 4.7 million suspected cases since April, after two years of claiming to be Covid-free.

title: Addiction: The faces of people fighting to break free and those helping
description: The number of professional workers seeking help for addiction is on the increase, charities say.

title: Pride at 50: The LGBT revolution sparked in a basement
description: The ripple effects of the Gay Liberation Front's 1972 march are still being felt.

title: Pride at 50: Rare photos of early marches
description: Striking shots of Pride parades from the 70s, 80s and 90s.

title: Hong Kong handover: What will the next 25 years hold?
description: Doubt hangs over the future of one of Asia's most vibrant cities as it reaches a crucial halfway mark.

title: Grown Up in Britain exhibition looks at the changing face of teenage kicks
description: A photo exhibition captures what's different and what's stayed the same in a century of teenage life.
